page.title: 08Richmond. My holiday.
page.content: All was a rush on a saturday morning, packing the things into the car.we were going to Hunstanton.Atlast we left the house.We went twenty miles then we stopted at a little chef inn to have something to eat.I had a pepsi cola and a American pancake.we set off again .We passed an orchard and Queen Ann's wood.We went round king's Lynn.We could now see the seaside.When we got to Hunstanton we were all very excited.When we got to the caravan site dad collected the keys.As we went to the caravan we passed a park.I can't remeber the number but I think it was 132.It was quite nice inside the caravan there was a shower in the bath room.On Monday it was the best day, we went swimming for 12 hours and we had lunch there.I had a drink of orange squash, etc. and then came home on Saturday.
